channel.title: Need help making server public
channel.description: OK NOW IF I TYPE MY IP I GOT FROM DYNDNS, WHICH IS BRANDONSCAPE.DYNDNS.COM, THEN I RUN THE SERVER (BTW ITS A FUNSCAP3 SOURCE) AND IM ABLE TO GO ON IT AND ETC. 1 PROBLEM, I ASKED MY FRIEND TO TRY IT OUT AND IT KEEP SAYING ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER. MY IP IS PORT FORWARDED..MY FIREWALL IS NOT BLOCKING THE CONNECTION, EVERYTHING IS ALL SET. SOMETHING MUST BE WRONG, COULD BE SOMETHING I TYPED IN WRONG, IDK. BUT SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME IT WOULD BE APPRECIATED. (ITS KINDA GETTIN ME MAD CUZ I WAS WORKING ON IT FOR LIKE 5 DAYS SINCE I GOT VACATION) THANKS TO THOSE WHO HELP ;D
